file_content.text: Ah. The apprentices of Darth Baras. Draahg, I will enjoy bleeding you anew.
And you. Before you arrived, Baras was but a bit player. He would be nowhere without you.
Baras has made me what I am today.
And I without him.
Your loyalty is misplaced.
That assessment is where our common ground ends, Vengean.
We agree on something.
Your talents are wasted on that man.
You only think that because he wanted you to; Baras has been pulling your strings all along.
He was never a bit player.
He has you snowed.
It sickens me. Your master doesn't deserve you. He's a coward, pushing buttons from the darkness. You and I are people of action.
Your status as a man of action is about to end.
You won't be for long.
You've been outplayed, Vengean. Darth Baras has shown the galaxy that your wits are dull and your reach is short.
Sounds like you want to forge an alliance with me.
Is that a proposition?
No, that hadn't crossed my mind. I can handle Baras on my own.
Still, it tickles me to imagine your master's expression if I came at him with you by my side.
Ha. Why would anyone leave Baras for someone he so easily duped? So easily exposed.
Enough of you. No, I will show everyone what it means to cross me. Baras and everything with his stink must perish.
You've been with Baras the longest, so you stink the most.
Starting with you. [Attack]
I'm interested to see who is superior.
This will be my greatest test.
Allow me to open your eyes to the obvious.
Baras pushed your buttons pretty well, didn't he?
I respect my master.
Your master's petty trickery is insignificant. Its only achievement has been to anger me. And you will all pay for it.
You sound like you're trying to convince yourself. I've served this house for years and never seen you so... small.
Enough! I will not be insulted nor patronized. Beg me. Beg me for mercy, and I will kill you quickly.
There will be no begging.
No. [Attack]
I think you underestimate me.
You're making a mistake.
I've killed scores more formidable than you.
You both die now!
I'd like to meet the imbecile who takes that offer.
Does that ever work?
You will regret mocking me. You will both die in excruciating pain.
